pkgmetadata.longdescription: A full-featured, pure-Python tiling window manager. Simple, small and extensible. It's easy to write your own layouts, widgets and built-in commands. It is configured entirely in Python, it has a command-line shell that allows all aspects of QTile to be manipulated and spected. QTile has a complete remote scriptability - so write scripts to set up workspaces, manipulate windows, update status bar widgets and more. It's scriptability has made thorough unit testing possible, making it one of the best-tested window managers around. Since it is QTile's aim to stay out of your way, you wouldn't see many screenshots, as there is usually nothing to show off in a screenshot.
